name: Skullcrusher (marccanalsp)
description:
------------

After hundreds of years of human warfare, a powerful virus has spread to most of the world's population, transforming the infected into horrible beings. 

A group of self-proclaimed fanatics called "The Creed" decides to take power in most major cities to establish a dictatorial regime, where all uninfected humans will be sought to experiment with them and infect them with the virus. This group filled the cities with infected and closed all of their exits. 

Survivors developed technology to be able to maintain the species, created cloning systems and terminals hidden by the city to ensure survival.

------------

1-4 Players

------------

Game made by Marc Canals, Gerard Bystron and Jassir Ortiz
